lead_paragraph: Prompted by the economy, a trend toward flat fees and other factors, many law firms are rethinking and, in some cases, radically changing associate programs.
snippet: Prompted by the economy, a trend toward flat fees and other factors, many law firms are rethinking and, in some cases, radically changing associate programs.

headline.main: At Law Firms, Reconsidering the Model for Associates’ Pay
headline.seo: Law Firms Take a Fresh Look at Associate Pay
headline.print_headline: At Law Firms, Reconsidering the Model for Associates’ Pay
